editorialSummary.text: Luxury brand founded in 1847 specializing in high jewelry, jewelry, timepieces & accessories.

originalText.text: We had a wonderful experience today at the Cartier boutique at Hudson Yards. Corentin assisted us and he was complete pleasure to work with and absolutely professional. While we usually do business at the Fifth Avenue location, we plan to make future purchases at Hudson Yards. Thank you for all your help, Corentin!

text.text: We had a wonderful experience today at the Cartier boutique at Hudson Yards. Corentin assisted us and he was complete pleasure to work with and absolutely professional. While we usually do business at the Fifth Avenue location, we plan to make future purchases at Hudson Yards. Thank you for all your help, Corentin!

originalText.text: Purchased my first Cartier from this location on a spontaneous decision. Decided to call the day before asking if they had any appointments as I could not see anything online. Andrea fit me into the schedule right away and was flexible when I was running late. When I arrived, everyone was friendly and sat me down right away. Andrea showed me the watches I asked for and let me and my girlfriend try on everything. She was friendly, helpful, knowledgeable, and everything I imagined Cartier’s service/brand to be. I cannot wait to add to my watch collection with future Cartiers.

originalText.text:
Cartier at 20 Hudson Yards in New York City is a luxurious destination where elegance meets contemporary style. As we entered the boutique, Cartier's rich history and heritage immediately captivated us.

The collection of Cartier's exquisite jewelry and timepieces is a visual delight, with each piece exemplifying artistry. The staff's impeccable service and knowledge enhanced our shopping experience, making it truly special.

The boutique's elegant ambiance, blending modern aesthetics with classic luxury, serves as the perfect backdrop for exploring Cartier's creations. Located at Hudson Yards, it offers a vibrant atmosphere and a five-star shopping experience for those seeking timeless luxury and sophistication.

originalText.text: The hottest neighborhood in midtown towards Hudson river..great shops  to shop restaurants and excellent walking areas like the highline

text.text: The hottest neighborhood in midtown towards Hudson river..great shops  to shop restaurants and excellent walking areas like the highline

originalText.text: I just read about all the awful service other people have been getting and I'm not surprised. I don't know if it's the shortage of labor or that they pay so little that they can only get the most awful people to work there. The most disgusting service. Worse than any discount store. I took my bracelet to be repaired. Months later, I have been given nothing but the run around by two employees who should be fired--Manny Reales and Gregory Lake. My bracelet band needed a new slip for the tongue. My bracelet was taken from me with an intact buckle. They lost the buckle. $350 dollars later they tried to tell me that the buckle doesn't come with the strap. They haven't found my original intact buckle and have done nothing to make things right. My bracelet, months later, is still there with nothing being done and no manager available to address the issue. I will never again spend a dime there. Tiffany's here I come. There is something really wrong with the Cartier organization. Stay away, spend your money where you are appreciated and respected as a customer. Not there!
